# -*- coding:utf-8 -*-import reimport urllibimport urllib2r = []s = ''for i in range(1,5):    url = 'http://m.qfpay.com/?author=%s'%(i)        try:        res = urllib2.Request(url)        #print res        html = urllib2.urlopen(res)        #print html.read()    except urllib2.URLError,e:        continue     m = re.search(r'href="http://m.qfpay.com/author/(.*)/',html.read())    #print m.group(1)        if m:        for j in m.group(1):                        if j =='/':                break            else:                s = s+j        r.append(s)        s = ''file = open('H:\hehe.txt','w')for k in r:    print k    file.write(k+'\n')    file.close()
